titleStmt.title: Proclamation discharging all English unmilln'd-money to pass, except by weight, and allowing and crying-up the English milln'd crown to three pound five shilling, with it's fractions proportionally.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh the twenty third day of January, and of Our Reign the eight year.
Signed: Gilb. Eliot, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson
